articles.title: Israeli military admits Shireen Abu Akleh likely killed by Israeli fire​​​​, but won't charge soldiers - CNN
articles.description: The Israel Defense Forces have ​admitted for the first time that there is a "high possibility" Palestinian-American Al Jazeera journalist Shireen Abu Akleh was shot and killed by Israeli fire while covering an Israeli military operation in May.
